description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.
Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.
Reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.

Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and increases the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and increases the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.
Gives a chance to slow your foes recharge rate by 25%.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.
